title: Periodically driving a many-body localized quantum system
title_cn: 周期性地驱动多体局部量子系统
abstract: Periodically driven quantum many-body systems can display rich dynamics and host exotic phases that are absent in their undriven counterparts. However, in the presence of interactions such systems are expected to eventually heat up to a simple infinite-temperature state. One possible exception is a periodically driven many-body localized system, in which heating is precluded by strong disorder. Here, we use a gas of ultracold fermionic potassium atoms in optical lattices to prepare and probe such a driven system and show that it is indeed stable for high enough driving frequency. Moreover, we find a novel regime in which the system is exceedingly stable even at low drive frequencies, a particular feature of our driving scheme. Our experimental findings are well supported by numerical simulations and may provide avenues for engineering novel phases in periodically driven matter.
abstract_cn: 周期性驱动的量子多体系统可以显示出丰富的动力学，并且可以容纳未驱动的对应物所缺少的奇异相。 但是，在存在相互作用的情况下，预计此类系统最终会加热到简单的无限温度状态。 一个可能的例外是周期性驱动的多体局部系统，其中强烈的混乱阻止了加热。 在这里，我们使用光学晶格中的超冷铁离子钾原子气体来制备和探测这样的驱动系统，并表明它对于足够高的驱动频率确实是稳定的。 此外，我们发现了一种新颖的机制，其中即使在低驱动频率下，系统也极其稳定，这是我们驱动方案的一个特殊功能。 我们的实验结果得到了数值模拟的充分支持，并可能为工程化周期性驱动物质中的新阶段提供途径。

title: Generalized non-reciprocity in an optomechanical circuit via synthetic magnetism and reservoir engineering
title_cn: 通过合成磁和油藏工程在光机电路中的广义不可逆性
abstract: Synthetic magnetism has been used to control charge neutral excitations for applications ranging from classical beam steering to quantum simulation. In optomechanics, radiation-pressure-induced parametric coupling between optical (photon) and mechanical (phonon) excitations may be used to break time-reversal symmetry, providing the prerequisite for synthetic magnetism. Here we design and fabricate a silicon optomechanical circuit with both optical and mechanical connectivity between two optomechanical cavities. Driving the two cavities with phase-correlated laser light results in a synthetic magnetic flux, which, in combination with dissipative coupling to the mechanical bath, leads to non-reciprocal transport of photons with 35 dB of isolation. Additionally, optical pumping with blue-detuned light manifests as a particle non-conserving interaction between photons and phonons, resulting in directional optical amplification of 12 dB in the isolator through-direction. These results suggest the possibility of using optomechanical circuits to create a more general class of non-reciprocal optical devices, and further, to enable new topological phases for both light and sound on a microchip.
abstract_cn: 合成磁已被用于控制电荷中性激发，其应用范围从经典的光束控制到量子模拟。在光力学中，光（光子）和机械（声子）激发之间的辐射压力感应参量耦合可用于打破时间反转对称性，从而为合成磁性提供了先决条件。在这里，我们设计并制造了具有两个光学机械腔之间的光学和机械连接的硅光学机械电路。用相位相关的激光驱动两个腔体会产生合成磁通量，再加上与机械浴的耗散耦合，将导致光子的不可逆传输，其隔离度为35＆＃8201; dB。另外，用蓝色失谐光进行的光泵浦表现为光子和声子之间的粒子非保守相互作用，导致在隔离器直通方向上定向光学放大12＆＃8201; dB。这些结果表明，可以使用光机械电路来创建更通用的不可逆光学设备，并且还可以在微芯片上实现光和声的新拓扑阶段。

title: State-resolved attosecond reversible and irreversible dynamics in strong optical fields
title_cn: 强光场中状态分辨的阿秒可逆和不可逆动力学
abstract: Strong-field ionization (SFI) is a key process for accessing real-time quantum dynamics of electrons on the attosecond timescale. The theoretical foundation of SFI was pioneered in the 1960s, and later refined by various analytical models. While asymptotic ionization rates predicted by these models have been tested to be in reasonable agreement for a wide range of laser parameters, predictions for SFI on the sub-laser-cycle timescale are either beyond the scope of the models or show strong qualitative deviations from full quantum-mechanical simulations. Here, using the unprecedented state specificity of attosecond transient absorption spectroscopy, we follow the real-time SFI process of the two valence spin–orbit states of xenon. The results reveal that the irreversible tunnelling contribution is accompanied by a reversible electronic population that exhibits an observable spin–orbit-dependent phase delay. A detailed theoretical analysis attributes this observation to transient ground-state polarization, an unexpected facet of SFI that cannot be captured by existing analytical models that focus exclusively on the production of asymptotic electron/ion yields.
abstract_cn: 强场电离（SFI）是访问电子在十亿分之一秒尺度上实时量子动力学的关键过程。 SFI的理论基础始于1960年代，后来通过各种分析模型进行了完善。虽然已经测试了这些模型预测的渐近电离速率与各种激光参数基本吻合，但在亚激光周期时间尺度上对SFI的预测要么超出了模型的范围，要么显示出与全激光的强烈定性偏差量子力学模拟。在这里，使用亚秒级瞬态吸收光谱法前所未有的状态特异性，我们遵循氙的两个价自旋轨道态的实时SFI过程。结果表明，不可逆的隧穿贡献伴随着可逆的电子种群，该电子种群呈现出可观察到的自旋轨道依赖性相位延迟。详尽的理论分析将这一观察结果归因于瞬态基态极化，这是SFI的意外方面，而现有的仅专注于渐近电子/离子产率产生的分析模型无法捕捉到这一点。

title: Transient superconductivity from electronic squeezing of optically pumped phonons
title_cn: 电子压缩光泵浦声子的瞬态超导性
abstract: Advances in light sources and time-resolved spectroscopy have made it possible to excite specific atomic vibrations in solids and to observe the resulting changes in electronic properties, but the mechanism by which phonon excitation causes qualitative changes in electronic properties has remained unclear. Here we show that the dominant symmetry-allowed coupling between electron density and dipole active modes implies an electron-density-dependent squeezing of the phonon state that provides an attractive contribution to the electron–electron interaction, independent of the sign of the bare electron–phonon coupling and with a magnitude proportional to the degree of laser-induced phonon excitation. Reasonable excitation amplitudes lead to non-negligible attractive interactions that may cause significant transient changes in electronic properties, including superconductivity. The mechanism is generically applicable to a wide range of systems, offering a promising route to manipulating and controlling electronic phase behaviour in novel materials.
abstract_cn: 在光源和时间分辨光谱学方面的先进技术已经可以激发固体中特定的原子振动并观察由此产生的电子性质变化，但是声子激发引起电子性质质变的机理仍然不清楚。在这里，我们表明，电子密度和偶极子有源模式之间的主要对称允许耦合意味着声子态的电子密度依赖性压缩，这对电子相互作用提供了有吸引力的贡献，与裸露的符号无关电子声子耦合，其大小与激光诱导的声子激发的程度成正比。合理的激励幅度会导致不可忽略的吸引力相互作用，这些相互作用可能导致电子特性（包括超导性）发生明显的瞬态变化。该机制普遍适用于广泛的系统，为操纵和控制新型材料中的电子相行为提供了一条有希望的途径。

title: Emergent Dirac fermions and broken symmetries in confined and deconfined phases of Z2 gauge theories
title_cn: Z2规范理论在受限和受限阶段出现的狄拉克费米子和对称性破裂
abstract: Lattice gauge theories are used to describe a wide range of phenomena from quark confinement to quantum materials. At finite fermion density, gauge theories are notoriously hard to analyse due to the fermion sign problem. Here, we investigate the Ising gauge theory in 2 + 1 dimensions, a problem of great interest in condensed matter, and show that it is free of the sign problem at arbitrary fermion density. At generic filling, we find that gauge fluctuations mediate pairing, leading to a transition between a deconfined BCS state and a confined BEC. At half-filling, a π-flux phase is generated spontaneously with emergent Dirac fermions. The deconfined Dirac phase, with a vanishing Fermi surface volume, is a non-trivial example of violation of Luttinger’s theorem due to fractionalization. At strong coupling, we find a single continuous transition between the deconfined Dirac phase and the confined BEC, in contrast to the expected split transition.
abstract_cn: 格规理论用于描述从夸克禁闭到量子材料的各种现象。 在有限的费米子密度下，由于费米子征的问题，规范理论很难进行分析。 在这里，我们研究了2 +1维的伊辛规范理论，这是一个对凝聚态物质非常感兴趣的问题，并表明它在任意费米子密度下都没有符号问题。 在普通填充中，我们发现量表波动会介导配对，从而导致在受限的BCS状态和受限的BEC之间过渡。 半填充时，出现的狄拉克费米子会自发生成＆＃960;磁通相。 有限的费米表面体积逐渐消失的狄拉克相是一个不平凡的例子，该例子由于分数化而违反了Luttinger定理。 在强耦合条件下，与预期的分裂转变相比，我们发现在受限的狄拉克相和有限的BEC之间存在一个连续的转变。

title: Edge reconstruction in fractional quantum Hall states
title_cn: 分数量子霍尔态的边缘重建
abstract: The nature of edge reconstruction in the quantum Hall effect (QHE) and the issue of where the current flows have been debated for years. Moreover, the recent observation of proliferation of ‘upstream’ neutral modes in the fractional QHE has raised doubts about the present models of edge channels. Here, we present a new picture of the edge reconstruction in two of the hole-conjugate states. For example, while the present model for ν = (2/3) consists of a single downstream chiral charge channel with conductance (2/3)(e2/h) and an upstream neutral mode, we show that the current is carried by two separate downstream chiral edge channels, each with conductance (1/3)(e2/h). We uncover a novel mechanism of fragmentation of upstream neutral modes into downstream propagating charge modes that induces current fluctuations with zero net current. Our unexpected results underline the need for better understanding of edge reconstruction and energy transport in all fractional QHE states.
abstract_cn: 量子霍尔效应（QHE）中边缘重建的性质以及电流流动的位置问题已经争论了多年。此外，最近观察到“上游”扩散。分数QHE中的中性模式引起了人们对当前边缘通道模型的怀疑。在这里，我们展示了两种空穴共轭状态下的边缘重构新图。例如，当前的＆＃957;模型=（2/3）由一个电导为（2/3）（e 2 / h）的下游手性电荷通道和一个上游中性模式组成，我们表明电流由两个独立的下游手性边缘通道，每个通道的电导为（1/3）（e 2 / h）。我们发现了一种将上游中性模式分裂为下游传播电荷模式的新颖机制，该机制会在零净电流的情况下引起电流波动。我们出乎意料的结果表明，需要更好地了解所有分数QHE状态下的边缘重建和能量传输。

title: Correlation-enhanced control of wave focusing in disordered media
title_cn: 无序介质中波聚焦的相关增强控制
abstract: A fundamental challenge in physics is controlling the propagation of waves in disordered media despite strong scattering from inhomogeneities. Spatial light modulators enable one to synthesize (shape) the incident wavefront, optimizing the multipath interference to achieve a specific behaviour such as focusing light to a target region. However, the extent of achievable control is not known when the target region is much larger than the wavelength and contains many speckles. Here we show that for targets containing more than g speckles, where g is the dimensionless conductance, the extent of transmission control is substantially enhanced by the long-range mesoscopic correlations among the speckles. Using a filtered random matrix ensemble appropriate for coherent diffusion in open geometries, we predict the full distributions of transmission eigenvalues as well as universal scaling laws for statistical properties, in excellent agreement with our experiment. This work provides a general framework for describing wavefront-shaping experiments in disordered systems.
abstract_cn: 尽管非均匀性产生了强烈的散射，物理学中的一个基本挑战是控制波在无序介质中的传播。空间光调制器使人们能够合成（成形）入射波前，优化多径干扰以实现特定行为，例如将光聚焦到目标区域。但是，当目标区域远大于波长且包含许多斑点时，可达到的控制程度尚不清楚。在这里，我们表明，对于包含多于g个斑点的目标，其中g是无量纲电导，斑点之间的远距离介观相关性大大提高了传输控制的程度。使用适合于开放几何中相干扩散的滤波随机矩阵集合，我们可以预测传输特征值的完整分布以及统计特性的通用缩放定律，这与我们的实验非常吻合。这项工作为描述无序系统中的波前整形实验提供了一个通用框架。

title: Surface-assisted single-crystal formation of charged colloids
title_cn: 带电胶体的表面辅助单晶形成
abstract: Substrate-induced heterogeneous nucleation is a promising way to form an extended single crystal with few defects while controlling its direction. Despite its technological importance, however, the physics behind this process has remained elusive. By studying the kinetic pathway of crystal nucleation and growth at a single-particle level both experimentally and numerically, we reveal that the keys to substrate-induced monomorphic single-crystal formation are matching of the angular symmetry between locally favoured structures formed in a supercooled liquid and the most stable crystal and non-trivial coupling of the former to substrate-induced layering in the liquid. These two conditions are crucial for direct formation of the most stable crystal while keeping its unique direction relative to the substrate. We also discuss special features of charged systems. Our finding indicates that pre-ordering in a supercooled liquid state under the influence of a substrate largely dominates the course of future crystallization, providing new insights into the control of heterogeneous crystallization.
abstract_cn: 基板诱导的异质成核是形成有缺陷的扩展单晶并控制其方向的有希望的方法。尽管具有技术重要性，但是此过程背后的物理原理仍然难以捉摸。通过实验和数值研究晶体在单粒子水平上的成核和生长的动力学途径，我们揭示了基质诱导的单晶单晶形成的关键是在过冷液体中形成的局部偏爱结构之间的角对称匹配。以及前者与液体中基质诱导的层间最稳定的晶体和非平凡的耦合。这两个条件对于直接形成最稳定的晶体，同时保持其相对于基板的唯一方向至关重要。我们还将讨论收费系统的特殊功能。我们的发现表明，在基质的影响下，过冷液态的预订购在很大程度上控制了未来的结晶过程，从而为控制异相结晶提供了新的见识。</ p>

title: Confined dense circumstellar material surrounding a regular type II supernova
title_cn: 围绕规则II型超新星的密密密麻的恒星物质
abstract: With the advent of new wide-field, high-cadence optical transient surveys, our understanding of the diversity of core-collapse supernovae has grown tremendously in the last decade. However, the pre-supernova evolution of massive stars, which sets the physical backdrop to these violent events, is theoretically not well understood and difficult to probe observationally. Here we report the discovery of the supernova iPTF 13dqy = SN 2013fs a mere ∼3 h after explosion. Our rapid follow-up observations, which include multiwavelength photometry and extremely early (beginning at ∼6 h post-explosion) spectra, map the distribution of material in the immediate environment (≲1015 cm) of the exploding star and establish that it was surrounded by circumstellar material (CSM) that was ejected during the final ∼1 yr prior to explosion at a high rate, around 10−3 solar masses per year. The complete disappearance of flash-ionized emission lines within the first several days requires that the dense CSM be confined to within ≲1015 cm, consistent with radio non-detections at 70–100 days. The observations indicate that iPTF 13dqy was a regular type II supernova; thus, the finding that the probable red supergiant progenitor of this common explosion ejected material at a highly elevated rate just prior to its demise suggests that pre-supernova instabilities may be common among exploding massive stars.
abstract_cn: 随着新的大范围，高节奏的光学瞬变测量的出现，在过去十年中，我们对核塌陷超新星多样性的理解有了极大的增长。然而，从理论上讲，大质量恒星的超新星前演化为这些暴力事件提供了物理背景，理论上尚不为人所知，因此很难进行观测。在这里，我们报告了爆​​炸后仅＆＃8764; 3＆＃8201; h发现超新星iPTF＆＃8201; 13dqy = SN＆＃8201; 2013fs的发现。我们的快速后续观察包括多波长光度法和非常早期的光谱（始于＆＃8764; 6＆＃8201; h爆炸后），它们绘制了周围环境中的物质分布（＆＃8818; 10 爆炸恒星的15 ＆＃8201; cm），并确定它被在爆炸前最后一个＆＃8764; 1＆＃8201;年期间以高速率射出的绕星物质（CSM）包围，每年大约有10 ＆＃8722; 3 太阳质量。在头几天内，闪光电离的发射线要完全消失，需要将密集的CSM限制在＆＃8818; 10 15 ＆＃8201; cm内，这与在70＆ ＃8211; 100＆＃8201;天。观测结果表明，iPTF＆＃8201; 13dqy＆＃160;是规则的II型超新星；因此，发现这种常见爆炸的可能是红色超巨型祖先就在其灭亡之前以很高的速率喷出了物质，这表明超新星爆发前的不稳定性可能在爆炸的大质量恒星中很普遍。
